name: He's a Shooter
description:
Aim and shoot in this casual Basketball shooting game and prove that you're a shooter. Play through many simple yet challenging levels while trying to collect all three shoes in each level with your customisable basketball.

- Play Offline, whether you have an internet connection or not!
- Play for completely free!
- Enjoy the simplicity.
- Unlock and customize with skins!
- Admire the stylised art style.
- Play your favourite basketball game.
- Perfect your shot!
- Prove you are a shooter!!!
